1.8.9.1.2.0:
New feature: hiding player join and leave messages!
Made the autoGG regex stricter, this should prevent any false positives.
1.8.9.1.1.0:
New feature: warns you when players in a list join the server you are in!
Slightly better buildscript and code.
1.8.9.1.0.1:
Random autoGG messages, no more "You cannot say the same message twice!" annoyance!
Added update checker.
Better metadata, and better code.
